entries.title: Want a Giant Neon Twitter Bird? It’s One of Many Items Up for Auction.
entries.description: The company’s artwork, high-end furniture and espresso machines are for sale in an online auction that evoked a more flush era when its tastes reflected its status as a hot tech-world employer.

entries.title: What Happened to All of Science’s Big Breakthroughs?
entries.description: A new study finds a steady drop since 1945 in disruptive feats as a share of the world’s booming enterprise in scientific and technological advancement.

entries.title: Apple Reaches Deal With Investors to Audit Its Labor Practices
entries.description: The tech giant will assess its compliance with its official human rights policy, according to a federal filing.

entries.title: Elon Musk’s Appetite for Destruction
entries.description: A wave of lawsuits argue that Tesla’s self-driving software is dangerously overhyped. What can its blind spots teach us about the company’s erratic C.E.O.?

entries.title: Elon Musk Faces Trial Over His 2018 Plan to Take Tesla Private
entries.description: Investors are seeking billions of dollars in damages for their losses after Mr. Musk posted a proposal on Twitter that never materialized.
